EmailTemplate.subject: Phone Call Follow Up - Five Star Award Candidate Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Regarding our conversation earlier today, I wanted to provide you with the link to your candidate evaluation form. You are a candidate for the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} {!Opportunity.Program_Name__c} award that will appear in {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
You can access your secure online link below to complete your candidate evaluation form. All candidates must complete the evaluation form to be considered for the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} award. The form only takes a few minutes to complete. If you would like to complete your information over the phone, you can contact me at {!User.Phone}.
Candidate Evaluation Form - Click Here to Complete The deadline to submit is end of day {!Opportunity.ACDF_Deadline__c}
Award winners are scheduled to be notified within 4-6 weeks of the deadline. If you have any questions please feel free to contact me with the information below.
Kind Regards,
{!User.Name} Research Representative
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway, Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
Reminder: Third party firms may have contacted you suggesting you are an award winner and offering you wall plaques or other products. These firms are in no way affiliated with Five Star Professional.
Only Five Star Professional can name you a Five Star award winner and provide official award-related products and services. Marketing organizations not affiliated with Five Star Professional do not comply with industry regulatory requirements and may be violating trademarks or copyrights.
